TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Roch_Marc_Christian_Kaboré, title = Roch_Marc_Christian_Kaboré, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roch_Marc_Christian_Kaboré} }

S.FORM: = Roch Marc Christian Kaboré = Mntucing hngkawas 1957 idas 4 jiyax 25 ka Roch Marc Christian Kaboré ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Burkina faso ta sayang o kiya ka Roch Marc Christian Kaboré, pnaah hngkawas 2015 idas 12 jiyax 29 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré (kngkawas 1957 idas 4 diyax 25 mntuting) ka Seyjicya Burkina Faso, kndadax kngkawas 2015 ida ngala Soto Burkina Faso. Mniq kngkawas 1994 dhuq 1996 iyax cida ngalan Cori Burkina Faso, mniq kngkawas 2002 dhuq kngkawas 2012 cida ngalan Burkina Faso Kokomin Gikay Cusi. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré u ngalan Mincu Mi Cinpu Taykay (CDP) Cusi uri, dhuq kngkawas 2014 mlatac Tang kiya. Mntna kngkawas, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa phiyu Jnmin Cinpu Undo Tang. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré mniq kngkawas 2015 idas 11 na kcka knbeyhing seyngkyo cida wada mbiyax mangal Soto Burkina Faso. Mniq kndusan niya seyji brah cida, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa mntaxa Ginghangcya. Brah kngdusan早年 Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa mntyting mniq Ouagadougou, kiya ka sotu Burkina Faso. Mnhdu pyasan lxayan kyoiku CPS (Patas Pnsdhuwan Mnhdu Muyas Pyasan Tutiping) daw, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré u musa muyas mniq Ouagadougou na 1 Pyasan Cinging Pyasan Sweyweyn Saint Jean-Baptiste de la Salle, mniq 1972 cida wada mangal Patas Pnsdhuwan BEPC (O Ci), iya u mniq kngkawas 1975 wada mangal Sweys Sweywey (A Ci). Roch Marc Christian Kaboré u lmutuc muyas Pyasan Tubeyhing Dijon smluhay Keyjayswey, Kongsang Qmlahang, kiya u mniq kngkawas 1980 wada mangal Swos Sweywey. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré u mniq France muyas iyax cida snturung qridin niya hiti Roch Marc Christian Kaboré Sika Bella Kaboré, ddha dha u mniq kngkawas 1982 cida msturung mi wada tnquli 3 laqi. Kndusan qpahun niya職業生涯 Kndusan niya ginghang銀行生涯 Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa tuhuy tama niya Charles Bila Kaboré (mnngalan Soto Maurice Yaméogo Seyhu Bucyo) mntna, mnniq Burkina Kwoci Ginghang mnngalan Ginghangcya. Mniq Thomas Sankara ngalan Soto iyax cida, och Marc Christian Kaboré hiti balay daw wada mkala phyuwan Burkina Faso knbeyhing Ginghang mseykining niya. Kngkawas 1984 cida (27 knkawas) wada phyuwan BIB Sokanji, kiya mi ida ngalan qpahun niyi dhuq kngkawas 1989 idas 9 cida wada psdhuwan bukung seyhu. Kndusan niya seyji政治生涯 Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa mnniq Burkina Faso seyhu ngalan Bucyo, Soto Tukubeycu Komung mi Kokomin Gikay Dayhyo. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré u mniq kngkawas 1994 cida ngalan Congri. Kngkawas 1996 idas 2 Mincu Mi Cinpu Taykay phiyu cida, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré u malax qpahun Congri, wada mburah Ccngtang na Tu1 Huku Soto, kiya mi Sotohu na Tukubeycu Komung. Kngkawas 2002 idas 6 diyax 6 cida, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa wada spuda seyngkyo mangal Burkina Faso Kokomin Gikay Cusi, lmutuc Mélégué Maurice Traoré. Snpeyyah CDP malax qpahun Kngkawas 2014 idas 1 diyax 6, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré tuhuy Mincu Tang Kcka duma niqan hhnhangan msupu pkla kari mlatac tang kiya. Rmngaw ka dsediq mnalax qpahun kiya, tang kiya u wisu dmuwi ini pnlngu mincu mi mqnaqah uuda muda naqah qpahun, kiya mi rmngaw kari ini sruwa knpriyux tang kiya na keykaku keyngpo plixun ka diyax iyax qpahun niya. Soto總統 Mniq kngkawas 2015 idas 7 diyax 4 dhuq diyax 5 mniq Ouagadougou na Palais des Sports muda MPP taykay cida, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa wada balay bay sdhuwan ngalan kngkawas 2015 Burkina Faso Soto Seyngkyo na MPP hosweynjn. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa kngkawas 2015 idas 12 diyax 29 muda psdhu phiyu Soto Burkina Faso. Kiya mi psdhu phiyu keyjay sweycya Paul Kaba Thieba ka Congri. Mnngalan Seyningbu Bucyo na Jean-Claude Bouda mniq kngkawas 2017 idas 2 diyax20 cida wada psdhuwan rmirih Roch Marc Christian Kaboré ngalan kwohwangbu Bucyo. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa mniq kngkawas 2020 idas 11 diyax 22 kcka knbeyhing seyngkyo cida wada mangal 57.74% hyo mntxal lmutuc mangal Soto dungan.

= Roch Marc Christian Kaboré = Mntocing hngkawas 1957 idas 4 jiyax 25 ka Roch Marc Christian Kaboré ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bokong klwaan Borkina faso ta sayang o kiya ka Roch Marc Christian Kaboré, pnaah hngkawas 2015 idas 12 jiyax 29 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré (kngkawas 1957 idas 4 diyax 25 mntoting) ka Seyjicya Borkina Faso, kndadax kngkawas 2015 ida ngala Soto Borkina Faso. Mniq kngkawas 1994 dhoq 1996 iyax cida ngalan Cori Borkina Faso, mniq kngkawas 2002 dhoq kngkawas 2012 cida ngalan Borkina Faso Kokomin Gikay Cosi. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré o ngalan Minco Mi Cinpo Taykay (CDP) Cosi ori, dhoq kngkawas 2014 mlatac Tang kiya. Mntna kngkawas, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa phiyo Jnmin Cinpo Undo Tang. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré mniq kngkawas 2015 idas 11 na kcka knbeyhing seyngkyo cida wada mbiyax mangal Soto Borkina Faso. Mniq kndosan niya seyji brah cida, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa mntaxa Ginghangcya. Brah kngdosan早年 Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa mntyting mniq Ooagadoogoo, kiya ka soto Borkina Faso. Mnhdo pyasan lxayan kyoiko CPS (Patas Pnsdhowan Mnhdo Moyas Pyasan Totiping) daw, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré o mosa moyas mniq Ooagadoogoo na 1 Pyasan Cinging Pyasan Sweyweyn Saint Jean-Baptiste de la Salle, mniq 1972 cida wada mangal Patas Pnsdhowan BEPC (O Ci), iya o mniq kngkawas 1975 wada mangal Sweys Sweywey (A Ci). Roch Marc Christian Kaboré o lmotoc moyas Pyasan Tobeyhing Dijon smlohay Keyjayswey, Kongsang Qmlahang, kiya o mniq kngkawas 1980 wada mangal Swos Sweywey. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré o mniq France moyas iyax cida sntorong qridin niya hiti Roch Marc Christian Kaboré Sika Bella Kaboré, ddha dha o mniq kngkawas 1982 cida mstorong mi wada tnqoli 3 laqi. Kndosan qpahon niya職業生涯 Kndosan niya ginghang銀行生涯 Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa tohoy tama niya Charles Bila Kaboré (mnngalan Soto Maorice Yaméogo Seyho Bocyo) mntna, mnniq Borkina Kwoci Ginghang mnngalan Ginghangcya. Mniq Thomas Sankara ngalan Soto iyax cida, och Marc Christian Kaboré hiti balay daw wada mkala phyowan Borkina Faso knbeyhing Ginghang mseykining niya. Kngkawas 1984 cida (27 knkawas) wada phyowan BIB Sokanji, kiya mi ida ngalan qpahon niyi dhoq kngkawas 1989 idas 9 cida wada psdhowan bokong seyho. Kndosan niya seyji政治生涯 Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa mnniq Borkina Faso seyho ngalan Bocyo, Soto Tokobeyco Komong mi Kokomin Gikay Dayhyo. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré o mniq kngkawas 1994 cida ngalan Congri. Kngkawas 1996 idas 2 Minco Mi Cinpo Taykay phiyo cida, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré o malax qpahon Congri, wada mborah Ccngtang na To1 Hoko Soto, kiya mi Sotoho na Tokobeyco Komong. Kngkawas 2002 idas 6 diyax 6 cida, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa wada spoda seyngkyo mangal Borkina Faso Kokomin Gikay Cosi, lmotoc Mélégoé Maorice Traoré. Snpeyyah CDP malax qpahon Kngkawas 2014 idas 1 diyax 6, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré tohoy Minco Tang Kcka doma niqan hhnhangan msopo pkla kari mlatac tang kiya. Rmngaw ka dsediq mnalax qpahon kiya, tang kiya o wiso dmowi ini pnlngo minco mi mqnaqah ooda moda naqah qpahon, kiya mi rmngaw kari ini srowa knpriyox tang kiya na keykako keyngpo plixon ka diyax iyax qpahon niya. Soto總統 Mniq kngkawas 2015 idas 7 diyax 4 dhoq diyax 5 mniq Ooagadoogoo na Palais des Sports moda MPP taykay cida, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa wada balay bay sdhowan ngalan kngkawas 2015 Borkina Faso Soto Seyngkyo na MPP hosweynjn. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa kngkawas 2015 idas 12 diyax 29 moda psdho phiyo Soto Borkina Faso. Kiya mi psdho phiyo keyjay sweycya Paol Kaba Thieba ka Congri. Mnngalan Seyningbo Bocyo na Jean-Claode Booda mniq kngkawas 2017 idas 2 diyax20 cida wada psdhowan rmirih Roch Marc Christian Kaboré ngalan kwohwangbo Bocyo. Roch Marc Christian Kaboré pa mniq kngkawas 2020 idas 11 diyax 22 kcka knbeyhing seyngkyo cida wada mangal 57.74% hyo mntxal lmotoc mangal Soto dongan.
